sentence: It’s, as you’ve indicated, speaking of evil, it’s evil as well,” Romney told CNN’s Dana Bash on “State of the Union.” Advertisement He went on to call out Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) and Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) for speaking at the third annual America First Political Action Conference, which was organized by white nationalist figurehead Nick Fuentes in Orlando, Florida.
author: Nina Golgowski
title: Sen. Mitt Romney Slams GOP 'Morons' At 'Evil' White Nationalist Conference

sentence: Sen. Mitt Romney, R-Utah, called Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-Ga., and Paul Gosar, R-Ariz., "morons" on Sunday after the two House lawmakers attended a white nationalist event whose participants heaped praise on Russia for invading Ukraine.

title: "I have morons on my team": Mitt Romney blasts radical Republicans in Congress

sentence: McGeachin accused Holmes of painting her as someone “guilty by association.” The Idaho lieutenant governor wasn’t the only elected Republican who appeared at this year’s AFPAC; others included Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Paul Gosar (R-GA).
